Dead By Daylight- это когда ты чинишь генератор,а тебя за плечо хватает Майерс. Это когда ты поднимаешь одного выжившего на плечо,а тебе в лицо 3 фонарика. Это когда ты на другом конце карты,но находят первым именно тебя. Это когда в команде у выживших 4 осколка.Это когда Убийца не доносит тебя до подвала,ты срываешься с плеча и он дисконектится. Это когда своего друга идут спасать 3 других выживших и ты их убиваешь. 
Итог:
За каждую сторону эта игра весела и интересна. За выживших она вдвойне лучше с друзьями. Ибо где у вас будет возможность вогнав выжившего в сон за Фредди Крюгера,сломать ему шею и тут же получить лив с плеча. 10/10

In Dead by Daylight, one selected player from a group of four (you) must be obsessively chased by a single killer for 10-20 minutes. Your allies only serve as a visual distraction. Its you that will traverse dangerous fields, warehouses, and towns as you desperately try to escape the grasps of an angry 16 year old.

You will be hit, beat, and put on a hook while the, now furious, killer stares directly into your eyes for the next 2 minutes and 14 seconds. Lucky enough to get off? Hey, that's okay because its you they want. Your friends are of no interest. You are the chosen one they will continue to chase and repeatedly punish.

But in situations this intense, where your palms are sweating and your heart is pounding.. you have a choice to make.

"Hey guys should I teabag this noob killer LMAO!!!!"

I originally purchased this game upon release, and had a few issues with the way the game worked at the time (no party system, unable to play ranked with friends, etc.) I ended up refunding it. I recently decided to pick it up again at a lower price and after hearing many of the issues I had with it were fixed. The game definitely hooked me this time around, as playing with a group of friends is a blast. The game can be enjoyable by yourself as well, but it really shines when you can hear your friends fear!

Being a pvp oriented game, it can be difficult for a new player to get into, especially when a lot of really good players deliberately keep themselves in lower ranks for "better" (easier) games. If you can get past that and put in the effort to learn the game's perks, map layout, object placements, killer abilities, killer FoV, and much more (yes, there's a lot to learn) then this game is a hell of a lot of fun.

Your experience will vary depending on if you choose to play survivor or killer, and whichever you play you will come to hate the people that play the other side, such is human nature. At the end of the day, you should try to shrug off negative experiences of other people trying to ruin your fun, as there are a lot of people who will play the game for actual fun and you can get a lot out of it.

In terms of the game itself, it seems to always have its fair share of bugs, but for the most part is a great game, and reasonably well balanced despite what anyone else might say. The devs do listen to their players and make changes, albeit slowly (they're a small team), and new content comes out on a regular basis. Go watch some gameplay on YT or something, check survivor and killer gameplay, and seriously if you think it looks interesting to you then just go for it, my words can't do it justice.

The major downside it does suffer is how repetitve it can end up getting, and I would recommend trying different builds to keep it interesting. The montly rank reset can be a bit draining too, as you end up back in games with people at a different skill level to you and it takes a week or so for things to sort themselves out again.

[b]Dead by Daylight[/b] nos ofrece un juego donde el sigilo, la tensión y la cooperación son protagonistas, 4 supervivientes se las arreglan para escapar de un asesino. Usa tus habilidades para escapar con tus compañeros... o abandonarlos a su suerte.

⠀⠀⠀⠀[h1][u]Jugabilidad[/u][/h1]

Puedes tomar el rol de un superviviente e intentar escapar. O el rol del asesino y matarlos a todos, es tu decisión.

El juego consta por el momento de 1 modo de juego; reparar 5 generadores dentro de un lugar desolado para abrir uno de los dos portones de escape. Cada superviviente y asesino tiene habilidades especiales únicas que puedes combinar con otras para hacerte la vida (...o la poca vida que te queda...) mas fácil.

La jugabilidad tanto para supervivientes como asesinos es sencilla: Desplazarse, interactuar y correr (este ultimo no esta presente en asesinos, pero "caminan" mas rápido de lo que corren sus victimas). La mayoría de las habilidades se activan en ciertas ocasiones y tienen cierto Cooldown, necesitaras conocerlas bien para ver a lo que te enfrentas.

Si juegas como Superviviente: Interactua con los generadores para repararlos; esto toma su tiempo, pero si cooperan mas colegas para repararlo tardan menos tiempo. Escapa del asesino corriendo a través de obstáculos, o escóndete entre la maleza. Rescata a tus compañeros de las garras del asesino, distrayendolo o quitandolos de sus ganchos de ofrendas al Ente. 

Si juegas como Asesino: Simplemente mátalos a todos y evita que salgan con vida. Les rompes la espina con un golpe, y con el segundo lo llevas al suelo.

⠀⠀⠀⠀[h1][u]Gráficos[/u][/h1]

El juego se basa en el terror, por lo que la oscuridad siempre esta presente. Pantanos, bosques, granjas y otro tipo de  lugares abandonados son el escenario perfecto para el acecho de nuestro asesino. 

Gráficamente el juego no es algo de otro mundo, una estética cómoda y bonita. Vegetación y una ligera niebla que cubre por completo tu pantalla. Fácil de configurar y puedes correrlo en calidad gráfica máxima con un PC medianamente decente.

⠀⠀⠀⠀[h1][u]Banda Sonora[/u][/h1]

La mayor parte del juego escuchas cuervos y la tensión del ambiente, la otra parte es simplemente un desolador silencio.

⠀⠀⠀⠀[h1][u]Observaciones[/u][/h1]

⠀⠀[b][u]Lo Bueno[/u][/b]
• Una idea original nunca antes vista
• Ideal para jugar solo o con amigos
• Excelente ambiente de tension

⠀⠀[b][u]Lo Malo[/u][/b]
• Bugs, muchos bugs que aun no ha sido corregidos
• Muchos DLC de pagos, aunque si los llegas a tener a un buen precio pueden valer la pena
• Al no haber servidores delicados (solo el host del asesino), el ping puede aumentar mucho dependiendo de su conexión 

⠀⠀⠀⠀[h1][u]Conclusión[/u][/h1]

Es un juego entretenido que aun le falta por pulir algunos errores, pero puedes pasártelo bien con este juego. No es una obra de arte pero le puedes tener cariño.

[b]• Jugabilidad: 9/10[/b]
[b]• Gráficos: 8/10[/b]
[b]• Banda Sonora: 8/10[/b]
[b]• Observaciones: 8/10[/b]

⠀⠀⠀[b]Mi nota: 8,3/10[/b]

This game has flaws. There's no doubt about it. It can be buggy; it can be frustrating; it can be a terrible time. But when it's good, it's REALLY good. It's exhilerating to be running away from a killer hot on your trail. It's satisfying to catch a survivor that has been evading you the whole game. You will sink hours and hours into this game if you let its flaws go. The developers really do care about DbD and continue to improve it. They have made a few missteps, but the fact that they care and continue to iron out the kinks is enough for me.

BUY THIS GAME.

I would have to recommend this game just off fun alone. I bought this game months ago and took a long time off because of bugs and matchmaking but the devs stuck with it and really smoothed things out. They've added a lot of killers and survivors to add variety to the game. Accept the fact that when a new killer gets released its going to take a few patches until they are more stable. They'll come out, everyone complains they are OP because no one has experience against them, they'll get nerfed too hard and then get balanced after that. If you can live with that, you'll have fun either trying to escape with your life OR murdering 4 victims brutally.
if u love nightmares dis is it!!

Dead by Daylight is one of those rare multiplayer games that makes it fun to both play by yourself or play with friends. 

Want a fun solo player experience? Play the Killer and single-handedly hunt down four other players. (Or in some cases chase them around a tree until your speed boost kicks in.)

Want a fun multiplayer experience? Get some friends to buy the game and make a four man scooby squad to evade/outsmart the killer.

The game does have some slight balance issues when it comes to match making, but the devs try really hard to make the game as fair as possible and so far every match has been a unique experience.
